thread.title: Stocks That Were In News On July 22, 2015
thread.title_full: Stocks That Were In News On July 22, 2015

title: Stocks That Were In News On July 22, 2015
text:
The Sensex ended the day with gains of 322 points, while the Nifty ended the day with gains of 104 points. 
Check the top gainers and losers in BSE & NSE stock market today . 
Bajaj Finance 
Non-banking finance company Bajaj Finance Ltd today reported 30.40 per cent jump in its net profit at Rs 275.63 crore for the first quarter ended June 30. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 5130, higher by 0.56 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 5203 during the trade. 
Pipavav Defence 
The company rose during the day and ended marginally lower on Wednesday on signing agreement with Russian company for refits of EKM 877 submarines in India. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 62.25, lower by 0.56 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 63.35during the trade. 
Cairn India 
Cairn India shares dipped and recovered in today's trade. The company reported a 24 per cent year-on-year drop with a consolidated net profit of Rs 835 crore for the quarter for first quarter. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 166, higher by 2.58 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday low Rs 156 during the trade. 
Eicher Motors 
The company reported 40.89 per cent rise in its consolidated net profit at Rs 221.83 crore for the second quarter ended June, 2015. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 21,164, lower by 0.81 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 20,775 during the trade. 
Sun TV 
Shares in another entertainment company Sun TV Network dropped after continuing worries over its license renewal. 
The stock ended the day at Rs 258, lower by 1.58 per cent on BSE. It touched an intraday high Rs 256 during the trade. 
GoodReturns.in
